oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: AfterHours
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Advertising; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (yellow and red on white) advertising AfterHours in Denver, Colorado. AfterHours is an alternative ministry of Jerry Herships to serve the poor and spiritually independent. Poster features a woodcut of a cartoon character.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:accessRights: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws.
